department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: the contract personnel will be responsible for performing activities connected with maintenance of heating, ventilation and air conditioning systems in office buildings of various floors, including inspection of equipment, ensuring routine maintenance, planning and implementing maintenance activities, identifying and addressing potential problems, and communicating with end users for planned or unscheduled services. An additional requirement is that contract personnel will need to provide around the clock support for the maintenance of CRA's data center.
description: It is for the provision of engineering and technical expertise related to temporary works in relation to the Central Heating, Ventilation Air Conditioning (CHVIA) systems that cool and heat CWB.
